meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Christiane Evaskis-Garrett Eli Rosenberger Rebecca Wald Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7491.

td.p: Christiane Evaskis-Garrett, a content developer from Jackson, Michigan
Eli Rosenberger, a Naval flight officer from Oak Harbor, Washington
Rebecca Wald, a psychologist from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $31,200)

tr.td: FESTIVALS
TRICKY CLUES
19th CENTURY AUTHORS
AUTO-MATIC WORDS
(Alex: Each response will be the model of a car.)
GEOGRAPHY "B"
BARE-KNUCKLE FIGHTING

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Eli] Paulus is Latin, of course, and it\'s not the same in English.)
...
(Alex: [To Christiane] No, Johannes, John, not the same.)
...
(Alex: The last pope of this name was in the \'40s--Pope [*] XII.)
EliWhat is Paul
$4,700
ChristianeWhat is John?
$5,998
RebeccaWhat is Leo?
$3,700
Pius')
